body:
The `has_test_method` checks a package for having a stand-alone test method defined.  It belongs with the package, not the `test` subcommand.  There are some pending PRs that would benefit from having the method in the core, and not command, modules.

This PR moves the method and an associated unit test to a more visible module.
title: Tests: Move has_test_method from test command to package module
